item.title: Former GOP Rep. Mia Love dead at 49 after battle with cancer, family says
item.description: Former U.S. Rep. Mia Love, R-Utah, died on Sunday at the age of 49 after battling brain cancer, according to her family.

item.description: Former U.S. Rep. Mia Love of Utah, a daughter of Haitian immigrants who became the first black Republican woman elected to Congress, died Sunday.
